comments.comments_text: A yellow card for a tackle by Eric Dier (Tottenham). Carlos Del Cerro doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Sebastian Rode displays great vision and sends a pass to Daichi Kamada (Eintracht Frankfurt), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball from close range in the back of the net. The score is 0:1.

comments.comments_text: The game is interrupted. One of the players from Eintracht Frankfurt is cautioned for aggressive play.

comments.comments_text: Stunning strike! Heung-Min Son (Tottenham) latches on to a precise through ball from Harry Kane before unleashing an unstoppable shot into the bottom right corner from the edge of the area. Fantastic goal. The score is now 1:1.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Heung-Min Son (Tottenham) shows good awareness inside the box as he latches on to a brilliant pass and fires a first-time shot into the roof of the net. Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg assisted in the goal. 3:1.

comments.comments_text: Carlos Del Cerro blows his whistle and Tuta (Eintracht Frankfurt) is shown a second yellow card for his foul. His manager will not be pleased. He has lot of time to think about it as he walks off.
